Package com.nokia.mid.iapinfo

IAPInfo API is a simple Java API, where the applications (MIDlets) can access fundamental Internet Access point and Destination Network related information.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AccessPoint Stores access point related information, such as: access point ID, access point name, bearer type, service type.
DestinationNetwork Destination network represents a named group of access points.
IAPInfo IAPInfo includes methods for retrieving information of Access Points and Destination Networks.
 

Exception Summary
IAPInfoException The main Exception class for IAPInfo API.
 

Package com.nokia.mid.iapinfo Description

IAPInfo API is a simple Java API, where the applications (MIDlets) can access fundamental Internet Access point and Destination Network related information. This information is retrieved from the the native OS, where all the communication related settings are stored. Only the information supporting access point or destination network selection is available:

  • IAP related information
  • Destination network
  • List of preferred access points
  • Last used access point
